member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Patterning.Build.RegistrySetValue
member.summary: MsBuild task to write registry settings.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Sets the type of the data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Patterning.Build.RegistrySetValue.Value
member.summary: Sets the value. If Value is not provided, an attempt will be made to read the Default Value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Patterning.Build.RegistrySetValue.RegistryHive
member.summary: Sets the Registry Hive. Supports ClassesRoot, CurrentUser, LocalMachine, Users, PerformanceData, CurrentConfig, DynData

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Patterning.Build.Resources.RegistrySetValue_RegistryHiveNotExist
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Registry hive '{0}' not found on machine '{1}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Patterning.Build.Resources.RegistrySetValue_RegistryKeyNotFound
